title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 December 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (19/12/2008 00:12): XWiki.AasishArora was modified by XWiki.AasishArora (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/AasishArora

xwikibot - (19/12/2008 03:41): Snippets.GenericXMLapiSnippet was modified by xwiki:XWiki.yish - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Snippets/GenericXMLapiSnippet

xwikibot - (19/12/2008 09:12): XWiki.SnippetClassSheet was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/SnippetClassSheet  
xwikibot - (19/12/2008 09:12): XWiki.SnippetClassSheet was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/SnippetClassSheet

xwikibot - (19/12/2008 11:47): Design.RestfulAPI was modified by xwiki:XWiki.fmancinelli - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/RestfulAPI  
xwikibot - (19/12/2008 11:49): Design.RestfulAPI was modified by xwiki:XWiki.fmancinelli - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/RestfulAPI  
xwikibot - (19/12/2008 11:49): Design.RestfulAPI was modified by xwiki:XWiki.fmancinelli - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/RestfulAPI  
xwikibot - (19/12/2008 13:19): XWiki.clissej was modified by XWiki.clissej (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/clissej  
MadOtis - (19/12/2008 13:47): Hello all.  I'm trying to install the v. 1.7 xwiki (WAR deployment) on Geronimo.  I'm connecting to a PostgreSQL database.  I've deployed the app, configured it according to instructions to connect to Postgres...  but, when trying to launch it (I'm assuming so it will create required tables in the database), I get an error:  DuplicateMappingException: Duplicate class/entity mapping com.xpn.xwiki.doc.XWikiDocument    Any suggestions o  
asyd - (19/12/2008 14:02): MadOtis: are you sure you correctly configure hibernate.cfg.xml ?  
xwikibot - (19/12/2008 14:04): Snippets.GenericXMLApiSnippet was modified by xwiki:XWiki.yish - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Snippets/GenericXMLApiSnippet  
MadOtis - (19/12/2008 14:04): asyd: I believe so.  I set the proper database connection properties.  The only thing that I added that I read on IBM's website was this single line:     <property name="hibernate.query.factory\_class">org.hibernate.hql.classic.ClassicQueryTranslatorFactory</property>    From what IBM says, the hibernate package deployed with xwiki is a different version than that deployed with Geronimo.  Should I remove that line and try again?  
asyd - (19/12/2008 14:05): ah, well, maybe you should try  
MadOtis - (19/12/2008 14:06): asyd: ok, I'll try it.  
MadOtis - (19/12/2008 14:07): Jeez... if it wasn't for their involvement in Eclipse... I would have to say that IBM SUCKS!   Removing their suggestion allowed it to work...  It's working now.  Sorry.  
asyd - (19/12/2008 14:09): :)  
MadOtis - (19/12/2008 14:23): ok, next step I can't get past...  Trying to log in so I can install the basic set of pages (XAR file)...  Trying to log in using 'Admin' pwd: 'admin' says "Wrong user name"...  Has it changed from what it says in the instructions?  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 14:24): MadOtis: depends what you have in your wiki. If you don't have the Admin user installed it won't workl  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 14:24): s/workl/work/  
MadOtis - (19/12/2008 14:24): vmassol: I installed just the stand-alone WAR file... IIRC: xwiki-enterprise-1.7.war  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 14:24): then you have an empty wiki  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 14:25): and you don't need to log in at all to do the import  
MadOtis - (19/12/2008 14:25): oh, ok.  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 14:25): just import the enterprise XAR and you'll be fine  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 14:25): at that page the Admin user will get imported btw  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 14:25): s/page/point/  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 14:25): bascially with an empty wiki there's no rights set  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 14:26): and you get the rights when you import the rights page from the XAR  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 14:26): s/page/pages/  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 14:26): like XWikiAllGroup, XWikiGroups, etc  
MadOtis - (19/12/2008 14:27): Ah... ok... importing it now.  Thank you.  
xwikibot - (19/12/2008 14:42): Design.RestfulAPI was modified by xwiki:XWiki.fmancinelli - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/RestfulAPI  
xwikibot - (19/12/2008 16:11): Design.ApplicationManager was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/ApplicationManager  
xwikibot - (19/12/2008 16:33): Design.ApplicationManager was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasMortagne - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/ApplicationManager  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:47): jvdrean: I'm trying to make the history/information tab at bottom of page not visible  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 16:47): yep  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:47): so I have created a showhistory property in XWikiPreferences  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:47): and set it to false  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:47): but it's not taken into account  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:47): any idea?  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:47): this is for my blog  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:48): not for XE :)  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 16:49): #set($showhistory = "no")  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:49): this is for a single page  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:49): I want this to be not visible for the whole wiki  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:50): (jvdrean)  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 16:50): ok in the prefs it's showhistory  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 16:50): too  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:50):     #set($showhistory = $xwiki.getWebPreference("showhistory"))  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:50): from docextras.vm  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:51): what am I doing wrong?  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 16:51): nothing apparently  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 16:51): I have a doubt, getWebPreference looks at the wiki prefs if the web pref is empty right ?  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 16:52): yep that's what it does  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:56): jvdrean: could it be that showhistory is defined somewhere beofre?  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 16:57): vmassol: I'll have a look directly in your wiki  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 16:57): ok thanks  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 17:02): vmassol: do you remember having been able to disable the footer from the prefs with the old footer ?  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 17:02): because AFAICS the test that I copied is wrong  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:03): jvdrean: no, I've never done that  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 17:03): it tests getWebPreference() against "no" when the boolean prop returns 0 or 1  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 17:03): so today to get it work you have to create a string prop and put no in it  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:04): oh I see  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:04): I can fix it with testing for both no or 0, wdyt?  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:05): s/with/by/  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:05): (jvdrean)  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:06): rationale: if we replace "no" by 0 then we're going to break all people using #set to "no" in their pages  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 17:06): I've fixed it on you wiki by creating a string prop for showhistory  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:06): so using a string is the right way to do it you think?  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:06): (rather than a boolean)  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:06): I'm talking about XE   
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:07): (thanks for fixing it on my wikià)  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 17:07): yes it's the right way  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 17:07): even if it would feel cleaner to have a boolean everywhere for this  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:07): then you agree with me  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:08): I think  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 17:08): yes  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:08): that we should test for both "'no" (deprecated) and 0  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:08): right?  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 17:08): yes  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:08): ok I'll fix this then  
xwikibot - (19/12/2008 17:12): Design.RestfulAPI was modified by xwiki:XWiki.fmancinelli - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/RestfulAPI  
vmassol - (19/12/2008 17:15): jvdrean: actually I need to test for "0", false and "no"  
jvdrean - (19/12/2008 17:15): right  
xwikibot - (19/12/2008 20:58): XWiki.GradualStudent was modified by XWiki.GradualStudent (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/GradualStudent
